Download DbMaster
Version 0.10
DBMS and platform agnostic

The primary focus of DbMaster is to provide the same features accross all major platforms and DBMS

Advanced SQL editor

Syntax highlighting, auto-completion, auto-indentation, result export and more

Open-Source

Under the Apache 2.0 license, it comes at no cost and you are free to redistribute and modify it

DBMS compatibility

DbMaster works with the following DBMS:

  • MySQL
  • PostgreSQL
  • SQLite
  • Oracle (WIP)
  • Firebird (partial)
  • IBM DB2 (partial)
